required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: The Safety and Pharmacokinetic/Pharmacodynamic Study of CKD-841 in Postmenopausal Female, Phase 1
clinical_study.official_title: A Randomized, Single-blinded, Parallel Design Phase I Clinical Trial to Investigate the Safety and Pharmacokinetics/Pharmacodynamics of CKD-841 A-1, CKD-841 D or Leuplin Inj. After Subcutaneous Injection in Postmenopausal Female

brief_summary.textblock: A randomized, single-blinded, parallel design phase I clinical trial to investigate the safety and pharmacokinetics/pharmacodynamics of CKD-841 A-1, CKD-841 D or Leuplin Inj. after subcutaneous injection in postmenopausal female

detailed_description.textblock: To investigate the safety and pharmacokinetics/pharmacodynamics of CKD-841 A-1, CKD-841 D or Leuplin Inj. 3.75 mg after subcutaneous injection in postmenopausal female

primary_outcome.time_frame: From before injection to up to 1008 hours post injection
primary_outcome.description: Cmax(Maximum concentration of drug in plasma) of Leuprorelin

primary_outcome.time_frame: From before injection to up to 1008 hours post injection
primary_outcome.description: AUClast(Area under the plasma drug concentration-time curve to last measurement) of Leuprorelin

primary_outcome.time_frame: From before injection to up to 1008 hours post injection
primary_outcome.description: AUCinf(Area under the plasma drug concentration-time curve extrapolated to infinity) of Leuprorelin

primary_outcome.time_frame: From before injection to up to 1008 hours post injection
primary_outcome.description: AUC7-t(Area under the plasma drug concentration-time curve from 7 days to last measurement) of Leuprorelin

primary_outcome.time_frame: From before injection to up to 1008 hours post injection
From before injection to up to 1008 hours post injection
primary_outcome.description: Vd/F(Apparent Volume of Distribution) of Leuprorelin

primary_outcome.time_frame: From before injection to up to 1008 hours post injection
primary_outcome.description: Tmax(Time to Cmax/Time to Emax) of Leuprorelin

primary_outcome.time_frame: From before injection to up to 1008 hours post injection
From before injection to up to 1008 hours post injection
primary_outcome.description: AUEC0-42d below baseline((AUEC that is below the baseline from 0 h to 42 days)) of the rate of change(%) relative to the base of the LH (Luteinizing Hormone), FSH (Follicular Stimulating Hormone), and Estradiol respectively.

primary_outcome.time_frame: From before injection to up to 1008 hours post injection
primary_outcome.description: AUEC0-28d below baseline(AUEC that is below the baseline from 0 h to 28 days) of the rate of change(%) relative to the base of the LH (Luteinizing Hormone), FSH (Follicular Stimulating Hormone), and Estradiol respectively.

primary_outcome.measure: PD(Area under the response (% change from baseline) curve)
primary_outcome.time_frame: From before injection to up to 1008 hours post injection
primary_outcome.description: AUEC(Area under the response (% change from baseline) curve) above baseline of the rate of change(%) relative to the base of the LH (Luteinizing Hormone), FSH (Follicular Stimulating Hormone), and Estradiol respectively.

primary_outcome.time_frame: From before injection to up to 1008 hours post injection
primary_outcome.description: Tmax(Time to Cmax/Time to Emax) of the rate of change(%) relative to the base of the LH (Luteinizing Hormone), FSH (Follicular Stimulating Hormone), and Estradiol respectively.

primary_outcome.time_frame: From before injection to up to 1008 hours post injection
primary_outcome.description: Tmin(Time to Emin) of the rate of change(%) relative to the base of the LH (Luteinizing Hormone), FSH (Follicular Stimulating Hormone), and Estradiol respectively.

primary_outcome.time_frame: From before injection to up to 1008 hours post injection
primary_outcome.description: Emax(Maximum % change from baseline of LH/FSH/Estradiol) of the rate of change(%) relative to the base of the LH (Luteinizing Hormone), FSH (Follicular Stimulating Hormone), and Estradiol respectively.

primary_outcome.time_frame: From before injection to up to 1008 hours post injection
primary_outcome.description: Emin(Minimum % change from baseline of LH/FSH/Estradiol) of the rate of change(%) relative to the base of the LH (Luteinizing Hormone), FSH (Follicular Stimulating Hormone), and Estradiol respectively.

secondary_outcome.measure: Safety Assessment by evaluating adverse events(AEs).
secondary_outcome.description: Assessment of the safety of subjects by evaluating adverse events(AEs).

arm_group.description: Investigational drug(=CKD-841 A-1) is prescribed single injection dose by subcutaneous to 8 of randomized subjects once.
Investigational drug(=CKD-841 A-1) is prescribed single injection dose by subcutaneous to 8 of randomized subjects once.
Investigational drug(=CKD-841 D) is prescribed single injection dose by subcutaneous to 8 of randomized subjects once.
Investigational drug(=Leuplin Inj.)is prescribed single injection dose by subcutaneous to 8 of randomized subjects once.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Healthy menopausal female
- β-hCG is negative at screening and before administration of investigational drug
- Infertility by sterilization operation before 5 months from screening excluding ovarian cancer, uterine cancer etc.
- Bwt ≥ 50Kg and Body Mass Index (BMI) ≥ 18.5 and < 28.0
Exclusion Criteria:
- History or current condition of disease related to Hepato-biliary system, renal system, nervous system, mental illness, immune system, respiratory system, endocrine system, hemato-oncology, circulatory system, musculoskeletal system or except for that, significant clinical disease
- Uncontrolled diabetes mellitus in the last three months
- Pregnancy or breast feeding
- History of taking medicine such as Leuprorelin acetate or similar affiliation drug within 12 weeks before administration of investigational drug
- Has hypersensitivity to the active ingredient or excipients or same affiliation drug of the investigational drug, hypersensitivity of a medicine contained gelatin especially
